job.description: POZENT is searching for ltstronggtMachine Learning Engineerltstronggt to work remotelyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltemgtApplicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future requires the sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United StatesltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtPosition Type Contract 1099ltbrgtltbrgtLocation New JerseyltbrgtltbrgtOnsite Flexibility 100 RemoteltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtQualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt BS or higher in Computer Science or similar Engineering Math Physics or equivalent software development experienceltligtltligt A strong quantitative background Probability Theory Statistics Linear Algebra etc Experience in data curationcleansing model evaluation feature engineering and dimensionality reductionltligtltligt 10 years of relevant industry experienceltligtltligt Proven ability to develop deploy and maintain machine learning models in a production environmentltligtltligt Experienced in writing highquality pipeline and notebook codeltligtltligt Fluent in Python and modern Client libraries like ScikitLearn PyTorch KerasTensorflowltligtltligt Experienced in NLP modelsltligtltligt Familiarity with modern computational tools ampamp infrastructure like AWSGCP Docker Gitltligtltligt Experience with distributed only systems and RESTful architecturesltligtltligt Adept in ambiguous situations flexible and comfortable making decisions using minimal available dataltligtltligt Comfortable working independently with minimal supervisionltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt Graph Neural NetworksltbrgtltligtltulgtPowered by JazzHRltbrgtltbrgtkRndWMFXkL
